English: carnival during the Lantern Festival, with lantern displays and traditional folk performances such as stilt walking and lion dance

e: `如~：「`今年~`的~`臺~`北~`燈會~`除~`了~`展示~`花燈~`外~，`還有~`許多~`相關~`的~`慶祝~`活動~，`十分~`熱鬧~。」
d.f: `元宵節~`觀賞~`花燈~`的~`集會~。`通常~`伴~`有~`舞龍~`舞獅~、`踩高蹺~`等~`民俗~`表演~`活動~。

English: carnival during the Lantern Festival, with lantern displays and traditional folk performances such as stilt walking and lion dance
